Name: Red Opal Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The combination of gin, blood orange liqueur, and blood orange juice results in clementine-like flavours with subtle flavours of orange flower water.
History: Adapted from the 1920s classic Opal recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Opal Cocktail contains 195 calories
